question: Which firm built the Interceptor Boat 'ICGS C-454' that was launched into the service of the Coast Guard?
explanation:
Interceptor Boat 'ICGS C-454', that has been built by Larsen and Toubro, was recently launched into the service of the Coast Guard.
The newly-built boat of the Indian Coast Guard (ICG) was launched in Surat, as per the recent notification from the Defence Ministry. It has a length of 27 meters and a maximum speed of 45 nautical miles or 83 kilometers per hour.
